positions.title: Software Engineer & Scrum Leader
details: Developing Angular application, consuming Java microservices. Application is centered around fraud identification and mitigation.
Lead Scrum of Scrums for 3 scrum teams overseeing backlog and tech debt prioritization for 25 member dev team.
Scrum Leader for 8 person scrum team, responsible for daily stand up, JIRA sprint backlog, bug tracking and triage.
Dev lead during weekly product deep dive in order to break down epics in preparation for grooming.
Application is implemented utilizing Angular 9/TypeScript, RxJS, NgRX, and Angular components built by our team converted from Experian Design System of web components.
User Story development also requires all devs to develop QA Automation via Selenium & Java.

Dev ops troubleshooting of pipelines running through Bitbucket, Jenkins, & Openshift.  Green builds require SonarQube, Veracode, and QA Automation project passing in order to merge and accept stories.

positions.title: Sr. Frontend Engineer
details: React/Redux development of tools enabling users to ingest and manage financial markets data; tool requires managing and building features that utilize custom canvas tools, product upsells, subscription alerts, and other complex details.

Legacy NodeJS Microservices management of middle layer for proprietary data tool for the financial services industry. Contributed to Auth/N, 3rd party integrations, rest endpt dev, analytics and setting up new services to support the full site infrastructure.

positions.title: Frontend Engineer II
details: React/Redux development of custom tool enabling internal users to ingest and manage client review data; including responding to customer reviews on platforms like Yelp, Facebook, Google, and others.
Participated in 6 person Scrum team, where I heavily contributed to writing feature & bug enhancements, leading grooming & prioritization, and a little bit of product development.

Technologies: Bitbucket, Pipelines(CI/CD), Kubernetes, Auth0, React (including Hooks), Redux, Redux-Saga, Styled-Components, NextJS, Cypress.io, Jest, NodeJS, Loggly, New Relic, MixPanel, & Private NPM registries.
Responsible for maintaining legacy code-bases written in NodeJS, using templating libraries and build systems like Gulp.
Q2 2019 tapped to lead 6 month development of Client Analytics service that serves as entry point dashboard for all clients via Single-Sign-On to view details around all DAS products.
Client Analytics platform designed with React for the frontend and consumes a GraphQL api that flows from company DataMart. GraphQL api is built with Apollo & Nexus using NodeJS.

positions.title: Software Engineer | Contract
details: Solo project to design, develop, deploy, & debug Customer Support site for internal CS Team. 95% of work completed Summer 2018.
Technologies: React, Auth0, Bootstrap, PuBNub, Node.js, Git, Heroku, Chart.JS

Site consumes restful API that enables user, once authenticated via Auth0, to query, change, & add new customer data based on inquiries. Implemented pings to IoT connected devices via Pub/Sub to generate real-time readings.
Project required dynamic environment switching to access different backend datasets based on customized user groups.
Chart.JS graphs were implemented to track daily & weekly metrics as well as graph time-series readings for determining device operating consistency.

summary.headline: Experienced software engineer with a history of  leadership and product management.
details: 14+ Years of Technical/Enterprise Account/Product/Project Management, leadership and team building.
Developed FinTech APIs & have extensive experience with SMB SaaS products, partnership negotiation, & freemium models.
Patents: Automated Entity Verification [US #8639930, #8732803, & #8856956]
